ai-patthana8.74:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.74:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to a teaching for refuge ...
ai-patthana8.74:2.1_0: A teaching doesn’t give rise to a refuge ...
ai-patthana8.74:3.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, or for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana8.74:4.1_0: ... five objects the result of the universal objects ...
